Posts.Title: Posting again Bbon8 I_Spy

Posts.Content: Bbon8 wrote: Hey there. 29 year old mom. I posted a few days ago... waiting on results of biopsy of small breast mass and enlarged lymph node. I am going crazy waiting. My lower back is hurting (has been for about a month) and I have almost convinced myself I have bone mets. Also, my inguinal nodes feel enlarged and now I'm starting to worry about lymphoma. However, an hour ago, I was sure that I didn't even have cancer. I am going crazy here! Any words of encouragement? Hoping for results tomorrow but who knows. This is complete torture Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Posting again Bbon8 I_Spy
